summary: Marelle is a Breton Follower, created with CK, she is a Spellsword and is equipped with basic ebony armor and ebony sword. Vanilla Standalone. V1.4 Fixed location.
descriptionHtml:
Breton follower Marelle is a Spellsword is equipped with basic ebony armor and ebony sword, and will level up with player, this is my first effort using CK to create a mod, not a modification of another, She is essential and can be married. I use EFF and she works fine with it! She can be found in Ivarstead at the Vilamyr Inn. Marelle is a standalone although I used several mods to achieve the look you see in the pictures.

Spells:
Heal Other
Ice Spike
Sparks

**************************************************************************************
Version 1.4 fixed Marelle's location she can now be found in Ivarstead at the Vilamyr Inn

In order for Marelle to look like she does in the pictures you need the following mods:

Natural Eyes by nevenbridge
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589/?

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?

CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/?

Armor by KIller Keo's mod:
Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2-V3 Armor Replacer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654/?

Thanks to these guys for such excellent work!

*************************************************************************
Incompatibilities:

None known as of yet, please report them to me if you find any.

*************************************************************************
Marelle has been checked with Tes5edit
author: Radogamer

files.name: Marelle
files.changelogHtml: fixed location, using the NPCE broke Marelles location used CK to fix.
